byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and ROBERT MACKEY

abstract: The exact nature of the tactics and weapons used by the various law enforcement departments called in to assist the police in Oakland, Calif., with crowd control remains murky.
snippet: The exact nature of the tactics and weapons used by the various law enforcement departments called in to assist the police in Oakland, Calif., with crowd control remains murky.

headline.main: Police Tactics Questioned in Oakland Protest
